reviewText: Wouldn't miss it.  3 of them are really good the rest are entertaining.
It was nice to see these stars again in this series.  I enjoyed the stories as well.
Amusing but not up to his novels.
Very interesting stories all in one set.

good value, wish there were more episodes.
the stories were pretty good.
video has artifacts, sound is 2 channel and is good.
Got this for hubby because he's Frederick Forsyth's fan.  He loves the set and watches them over and over when there's nothing on TV or not on NetFlix.

These six movies of which I saw four are at best mediocre. There is no comparison to The Day of The Jackal which of course I thought was better than excellent. I guess it was too much to expect that Frederick Forsyth could equal the afore mentioned movie..

this six pack is a great value for the price ie., bang for the buck. all made for tv movies, reasonably good acting, plot, and location. mr. forsyth introduces each film and places it in the proper context. the best of the B spy movie genre.
